# Issue Template

## Problem statement
Describe the problem clearly and include relevant context.

## Proposed solution
Describe the expected solution or direction.

## Affected component
Specify which component is impacted (core, planner, policy, executor, docs, etc.).

## Security implications
Describe any security impact or indicate "None known".

## Scope impact
Explain whether this is a small fix, medium change, or architecture-level change.
